content: Once the limit is reached, all users will be added with User permissions only. To be able to add further admins, contact the {{productName}} administrator to upgrade the tariff plan.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message that informs users when their tariff plan almost reaches its limit, indicating that only user permissions will be available. It appears in the UI as a notification or alert. The message encourages users to contact an administrator for assistance in upgrading their tariff plan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is awkwardly translated. A more natural Azerbaijani phrasing would be needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Daha çox administrator əlavə etmək üçün…

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "təkmilləşdirmək" (to improve) in the context of a tariff plan doesn't quite fit. It implies general improvement, not necessarily upgrading to a higher tier.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: yüksəltmək

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'əlavə etmək' feels slightly clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Daha çox administrator üçün tarif planını yüksəltmək üçün…

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "oprávněním User (Uživatel)" is awkward and redundant. 'Uživatel' is the Czech word for 'User', so including it in parentheses is unnecessary and disrupts the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: oprávněním uživatele

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Chcete-li mít možnost přidávat další administrátory" is overly formal and slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pro přidávání dalších administrátorů

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "který provede upgrade tarifního plánu" is a bit literal translation. It's more natural to say something like 'prove že upgrade tarifního plánu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: provede upgrade tarifního plánu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "τιμολογιακό σας πρόγραμμα" is a bit clunky. A more natural Greek phrasing might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: τιμολογιακό σας πακέτο

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Käyttäjäoikeudet" is a literal translation of "User permissions" but sounds awkward in Finnish. It would be more natural to use a term like "käyttäjän oikeudet" or simply "käyttäjät".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kaikille käyttäjille lisätään vain käyttäjän oikeudet, kun raja on saavutettu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Pääkäyttäjään” is a more formal translation of administrator and sounds unnatural in this context. It’s better to use a simpler equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kaikille käyttäjille lisätään vain käyttäjän oikeudet, kun raja on saavutettu. Voidaksesi lisätä lisää ylläpitäjiä, ota yhteyttä {{productName}}:n ylläpitäjään päivittääksesi tilauksesi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'päivittääksesi tilauksesi' is a rather literal translation. A more natural Finnish phrase would convey 'to upgrade the plan'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kaikille käyttäjille lisätään vain käyttäjän oikeudet, kun raja on saavutettu. Voidaksesi lisätä lisää ylläpitäjiä, ota yhteyttä {{productName}}:n ylläpitäjään, jotta voit päivittää tilauksesi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is translated as "Այլ ադմիններ ավելացնելու համար". While technically correct, a more natural and idiomatic Armenian translation would be something like "ևս ադմիններ ավելացնելու համար" (and to add more admins).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Այլ ադմիններ ավելացնելու համար → ևս ադմիններ ավելացնելու համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is not accurately translated. "Further admins" implies adding more admins beyond the current ones. The Japanese translation doesn't convey this nuance. A more accurate translation would focus on the ability to *initially* add admins, or restoring admin privileges if they were lost.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 管理者を追加できるようにするには (To be able to add administrators) or 管理者権限を回復するには (To restore administrator privileges).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'User permissions only' isn't perfectly conveyed. While 'ユーザー権限のみで追加されます' is understandable, a more accurate translation that captures the restriction would benefit from a more specific term for 'permissions' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ユーザー権限のみが付与された状態で追加されます (Users will be added with only user permissions applied).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is translated as "Pentru a adăuga administratori". While technically correct, it lacks the nuance of 'further' or 'additional'. A more accurate translation might convey the concept of adding *more* administrators.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru a adăuga *mai mulți* administratori

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "contact the {{productName}} administrator to upgrade the tariff plan" is translated as "contactați administratorul {{productName}}  pentru a schimba planul tarifar".  'Upgrade' has a specific meaning (increasing the tier) that 'schimba' (change) doesn't fully capture. Using a word that implies an increase in plan level would be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: contactați administratorul {{productName}} pentru a *actualiza* planul tarifar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "සියලු පරිශීලකයින් පරිශීලක අවසර සහිතව පමණක් එකතු කරනු ලැබේ" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "all users will be added with User permissions only." A better translation might be something like "සියලු පරිශීලකයින්ට පරිශීලක අවසරය පමණක් හිමි වනු ඇත." or "සියලු පරිශීලකයින්ට පරිශීලක අවසරය හිමි වනු ඇත.“
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සියලු පරිශීලකයින්ට පරිශීලක අවසරය පමණක් හිමි වනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "තවදුරටු පරිපාලකයන් එකතු කිරීමට" is not the most natural translation of "to be able to add further admins." A more suitable translation would be something like "තවදුරටු පරිපාලකයන් යෙදවීමට".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තවදුරටු පරිපාලකයන් යෙදවීමට

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ගාස්තුව වැඩි කර ගන්න" is a bit colloquial for contacting the administrator to upgrade. A more formal and professional translation would be something like "ගාස්තුව වැඩි කර ගැනීමට අමතරස්ථානයක් ලබා ගන්න“.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ගාස්තුව වැඩි කර ගැනීමට අමතරස්ථානයක් ලබා ගන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To be able to add further admins' is a bit awkward in Slovak. It's better to rephrase for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ak chcete mať možnosť pridávať ďalších administrátorov

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Once the limit is reached' is translated as 'Po dosiahnutí limitu'. While technically correct, a more natural and clearer Slovak phrasing might be 'Keď bude limit dosiahnutý'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Keď bude limit dosiahnutý

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Корисничким' is a possessive form, but it's unclear if it's the best fit here. It should likely be 'Корисничких' to agree with the plural 'корисници'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Када се достигне лимит, сви корисници ће бити додати са само Корисничких дозволама.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence 'сви корисници ће бити додати са само Корисничких дозволама' could be slightly improved for clarity. Consider rephrasing to emphasize the change in permissions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Када се достигне лимит, сви корисници добијају само Корисничке дозволе.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Da biste mogli dalje da dodajete admine' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Da biste mogli da dodajete više administratora...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term 'User permissions' is translated as 'Korisničkim dozvolama'. While technically correct, 'Korisničke uloge' might be a more common and clearer term in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Korisničke uloge

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is translated as "Щоб мати можливість далі додавати адміністраторів". While technically correct, it's a bit verbose and less natural in Ukrainian. A more natural phrasing would be "Щоб мати змогу додавати адміністраторів..."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Щоб мати змогу додавати адміністраторів...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "User permissions only" is translated as "Người dùng bình thường." While "bình thường" can imply a basic user, it loses the nuance of permissions. A more accurate translation would convey the restricted access or lack of admin privileges.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Người dùng với quyền hạn cơ bản

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese translation keeps the "{{productName}}" placeholder. It's unclear if this should be a dynamic variable or a literal string. Consistency with the English source is important.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider if the placeholder should be translated, kept as is, or replaced with a localized product name.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Once the limit is reached, all users will be added with User permissions only" is slightly awkward. The translation "一旦达到限制，所有新添加用户将仅具有用户权限" implies that only *newly added* users will have user permissions, which isn't precisely what the English means. It’s more about *all* users from that point forward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 一旦达到限制，所有用户将仅具有用户权限。
